page.title: 09DURAFENCING LTD, ANDERTON.
page.content: There is a Durafencing factory in Anderton, near Northwich, which specializes in the manufacture of concrete fencing posts, although they also make concrete panels and lintels. Their products are despatched all over the U.K. The firm was founded 7 years ago by Mr. C.P. Baldwin and this factory is now one of several throughout Britain, with an H.Q. in Manchester. The Anderton factory occupies 17,000 sq. ft. and employs 26 people. However, business is good at present and should be expanding in the near future. In fact some of the other plants are now making steel objects. Durafencing sell direct to builders, not to the general public. They advertise a lot in local papers and trade magazines. The factory works from Monday to Friday but not at the weekend.
